splash.description:
"Here's our chance!"
"Hey, it's on our side!"

cards.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When your character triggers an Elemental Reaction: Deal +1 DMG. (Max twice per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: A Thousand Nights' Dawnsong: A Thousand Floating Dreams
splash.description:
"There is an appointed time for all things to live and die, just like the ceaseless cycles of night and dawn."
"May the stories within this lamp grant you dreams worth looking forward to."

cards.name: Amos' Bow
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When the character uses a Skill that costs at least a total of 5 Elemental Dice and Energy: +2 additional DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Strong-willed: Amos' Bow
splash.description:
"I dreamt of ocean waves and sand, of lush forests and land."
"I dreamt of boars playing in berry bushes, of a towering spire."

cards.name: Elegy for the End
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Burst: Create Millennial Movement: Farewell Song.
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

keywords.name: Millennial Movement: Farewell Song
keywords.description:
Your character deals 1 increased DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 2

splash.title: The Parting Refrain: Elegy for the End
splash.description:
"...But no wind in any season on earth"
"Shall have you gaze upon me again."

cards.name: Skyward Pride
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Sky-rippin: Skyward Pride
splash.description: This is a tale of sky-shaking valor. Bearing the will to defend all, let the wind dragon bestow wrath upon its vile nemesis.

cards.name: The Bell
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses a skill: Gives 1 Shield point to your active character. (Once per Round, stacks up to 2 points)
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Rebellious Guardian: The Bell
splash.description:
There once was a traitor who brandished a blade against his fallen clan.
Though this individual was eventually cast out from his clan, rumor has that his organization continued their chosen duties.
Legend claims that even the Wolf Pup Rostam might have been involved...

cards.name: Vortex Vanquisher
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When your active character is protected by a Shield Combat Status, you deal +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: If you have a Combat Status that grants a Shield on your side, add 1 Shield point to that Combat Status. (Once per Round)
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Golden Majesty: Vortex Vanquisher
splash.description:
Folklore spoke of a vast shadow entrenched in the depths of the ocean capable of swallowing passing warships...
At tale's end, they believe that Rex Lapis once wielded a spear that pierced the rainbow, pinning the churning vortex that had once terrorized the oceans in the center of the deep sea.

cards.name: Engulfing Lightning
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Triggers automatically once per Round: If the character to which this attached does not have Energy, they will gain 1 Energy.
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Timeless Dream: Engulfing Lightning
splash.description:
The naginata was a lethal weapon by which scattered dross might be cut away.
And the one who wielded that naginata was one who guarded the path to eternity.

cards.name: Skyward Blade
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Sky-piercing: Skyward Blade
splash.description:
The sky-piercing fang. With nemesis vanquished, the wind dragon fell into a deep slumber.
Centuries passed, and Dvalin's sacrifice was all but forgotten by Mondstadt.
A prayer, this sword is. May Dvalin's name be restored.

cards.name: Emblem of Severed Fate
cards.description:
After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.
The DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2 (once per Round).
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Emblem of Severed Fate: Ornate Kabuto
splash.description:
Thirteen years went by like a dream.
The scarlet snow flies through the shadowed pass like smoke.
You have now gone afar.

cards.name: Tenacity of the Millelith
cards.description:
When Action Phase begins: The character to which this is attached gains Unmovable Mountain that provides 2 Shield points.
After this character takes DMG: If the character this card is attached to is the active character, create 1 Elemental Die matching this character's Elemental Type. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

keywords.name: Unmovable Mountain
keywords.description: Provides 2 Shield points to protect the equipped character.

splash.title: Tenacity of the Millelith: General's Ancient Helm
splash.description:
"...To ensure that the afflicted civilians could safely escape, and to maintain their honor in the eyes of the Lord of Geo,
The helmet-clad troops of the front line took the lead, pointing their spears towards the Abyss and charging into battle."

cards.name: Thundering Poise
cards.description:
When the character uses a Normal Attack or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

splash.title: Stilling Calamity: Thundering Poise
splash.description:
"...Tianqiu once played host to a Yaksha, four-armed and mighty."
"He came to The Chasm from afar, to the praises of the tribes."

cards.name: Vermillion Hereafter
cards.description:
When the character uses a Normal Attack or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
After a character is switched to the active character: During this Round, character deals +1 Normal Attack DMG.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

splash.title: Masked Twilight: Vermillion Hereafter
splash.description:
"Do you not hear? The drums die in the north wind, the hero sinks into the vortex."
"Have you not seen? The Yaksha's battle for the dawn — alas for a life so spent."

cards.name: Capricious Visage
cards.description:
When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

splash.title: Preponderant Recollection: Capricious Visage
splash.description:
Even a faint smile could not conceal her sorrow.
Though this is a festive day, it seems more like a farewell...

cards.name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
cards.description:
When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
If the character has at least 2 Energy, this character's Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills will deal +1 DMG.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

splash.title: Fleeting Iridescence: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
splash.description:
"...Losing one's memory is no different from losing one's life. It is like death amidst darkness eternal."
"Life is full of uncertainty. Love is fleeting, and even lasting memories may be lost..."

cards.name: Tenshukaku
cards.description: When the Action Phase begins: If you have 5 different kinds of Elemental Die, create 1 Omni Element.

splash.title: Omnipresence Over Mortals
splash.description: "What matters is that I tread the path of eternity on my people's behalf."

cards.name: Sangonomiya Shrine
cards.description:
End Phase: Heall all your characters for 1 HP.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: The Pearlescent Palace
splash.description: "Sangonomiya was once an ocean abyss, until the Great Serpent came, forming a vortex with its spiral movements, and fashioning the coral into an island."

cards.name: Sumeru City
cards.description: When your character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: If you do not have more Elemental Dice than cards in your hand, spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

splash.title: The City Where All Wisdom Resides
splash.description: Under the luxuriant Divine Tree, the sages of the academy city have accumulated all the knowledge there is to be gathered.

cards.name: Vanarana
cards.description:
End Phase: Collect up to 2 unused Elemental Dice.
When Action Phase begins: Reclaim the dice you collected using this card.

splash.title: Abidance of the Forested Path
splash.description: "Enter the memories of the trees in the forest, descend into seedbeds sprouting the dreams of slumbering leaves, and dive into a world free of woes."

cards.name: Chinju Forest
cards.description:
When Action Phase begins: If you do not start first, create 1 Elemental Die that matches the Type of your active character.
Usage(s): 3

splash.title: Abode of Dwelling Demons
splash.description: Legend has it that this sacred forest was once home to many demons.

cards.name: Hanachirusato
cards.description:
When a Summon disappears: This card gains 1 Cleansing Ritual Progress. (Max 3)
When you play a Weapon or Artifact Card: If you already have 3 Cleansing Ritual Progress, discard this card and cause the card you play to cost 2 less Elemental Dice.

splash.title: Persistence of Pain: Hanachirusato
splash.description: "When shall we meet again after this parting? For life is like the morning dew."

cards.name: Kid Kujirai
cards.description: When the Action Phase begins: Create 1 Omni Element. Then if your opponent's Support Zone is not full, transfer this card to your opponent's Support Zone.

splash.title: Temari-Hiding Intentions: Kid Kujirai
splash.description: "When you hide a Temari, you have to hide it within the time of a Temari song. The person who is looking for it will also find it within a song's time. That will make the game fair!"

cards.name: Xudong
cards.description: When playing a Food Event Card: Spend 2 Less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Fulfillment First: Xudong
splash.description: "Hmm? A problem. Agh. We can deal with it after we finish eating."

cards.name: Dunyarzad
cards.description:
When playing a Companion Support Card: Spend 2 Less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round).
After playing a Companion Support Card: Draw 1 random Companion Support Card from your deck (once per match).

splash.title: Purity of Trust: Dunyarzad
splash.description: "The point of living is to not leave behind any regrets."

cards.name: Rana
cards.description: After your character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Type as your next off-field character. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Gem of Remembrance: Rana
splash.description: "We still have a lot of time with each other. We can explore the vastness of the forest, the world, and the future together."

cards.name: Red Feather Fan
cards.description: After you switch characters: The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. It will also cost 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Ineffable Breeze: Red Feather Fan
splash.description:
Legend has it that this fan is capable of unleashing various effects in the hands of a tengu warrior.
But in the hands of an ordinary person, it only possesses the power to "make one's body lighter."
Even so, this degree of power is more than useful for the average individual.

cards.name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
cards.description:
After your character uses a skill: This card will accumulate 1 Treasure Clue.
When this card has stored 3 Treasure Clues, discard this card and draw 3 cards.

splash.title: Revelation's Potential: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
splash.description: Strange Seelie capable of guiding people toward treasure. Legend has it that some individuals know how to communicate with these Seelie...

cards.name: Wind and Freedom
cards.description:
During this turn, after one of your characters uses a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.
(You must have at least 2 Mondstadt characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Verse of Unchained Happenings
splash.description: "Someday, the winds will blow towards a brighter future."

cards.name: Stone and Contracts
cards.description:
When the Action Phase of the next Round begins: Create 3 Omni Element and draw 1 card.
(You must have at least 2 Liyue characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Contract of Eons Unshaken
splash.description: "This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

cards.name: Thunder and Eternity
cards.description:
Convert all your Elemental Dice to the Type of the active character.
(You must have at least 2 Inazuman characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Dream of Evanescent Eternity
splash.description: "It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

cards.name: Nature and Wisdom
cards.description:
Draw 1 card. After that, switch any cards in your hand.
(You must have at least 2 Sumeru characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Wisdom of the Joyous Spirits
splash.description: "That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has always been the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."

cards.name: Fatui Conspiracy
cards.description:
Create 1 Fatui Ambusher of a random type on the opponent's field.
(You must have at least 2 Fatui characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Fatui Ambusher
keywords.description:
Fatui Ambushers will trigger their effects after characters on the side of the field they are at use Skills, and will deal DMG to the active character on that side of the field. (Once per Round)
There are 4 kinds of Fatui Ambushers in total:
Cryo Cicin Mage: Deals 1 Cryo DMG when triggered, 2 Usages.
Mirror Maiden: Deals 1 Hydro DMG when triggered, 2 Usages.
Pyroslinger Bracer: Deals 1 Pyro DMG when triggered, 2 Usages.
Electrohammer Vanguard: Deals 1 Electro DMG when triggered, 2 Usages.

splash.title: A Conspiracy Under Winter's Resplendence
splash.description: ...But none know the intricacies of what they are plotting.

cards.name: Plunging Strike
cards.description: Combat Action: Switch to the target character. That character then uses a Normal Attack.

splash.title: Fallraid
splash.description: "...Don't deploy your Wind Glider halfway down! You'll get discovered!"

cards.name: Heavy Strike
cards.description:
During this round, your current active character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.
When this Normal Attack is a Charged Attack: Deal +1 additional DMG.

splash.title: The Shatterstone Method
splash.description:
For those that aren't so strong...
It's best to regard the "The Shatterstone Method" as just a "metaphor."

cards.name: The Legend of Vennessa
cards.description: Create 4 basic Elemental Dice of different types.

splash.title: Dream of Freedom Unrelinquished
splash.description:
"Lonely forest breezes converged, jointly they overthrew the tyrant's tower from the sky."
"Broken free from shackles at last, the young lioness stood firm in the winds with her head held high."

cards.name: Friendship Eternal
cards.description: Players with less than 4 cards in their hand draw cards until their hand has 4 cards in it.

splash.title: Bosom Friends
splash.description: Good friends never truly leave. They stay with us in another form.

cards.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
cards.description:
Revives the target character and heals that character for 1 HP.
(You can only revive 1 character via Food per Round, and a character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

splash.title: Teyvat Fried Egg
splash.description:
With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.
Take care to eat this meal slowly, and avoid choking the throat of destiny when impelled by the fullness of life's vitality.

cards.name: Sashimi Platter
cards.description:
Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Sashimi Platter
splash.description:
Under the blade of a master chef, the texture of the ingredients remains pristine. Upon consumption, it is as if something living is leaping inside your mouth...
Hold on, could these ingredients still be...

cards.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
cards.description:
During this Round, all your characters' next Elemental Skills deal +2 DMG.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Tandoori Roast Chicken
splash.description:
The chicken and spices are capable of performing a mysterious Sumeru dance on the tip of your tongue, evoking the image of a festive banquet...
But even a dish so delicious has its last bite, and every feast has its end.

cards.name: Butter Crab
cards.description:
During this Round, all your characters take -2 DMG the next time.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Butter Crab
splash.description:
The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the taste buds so seductively that none can resist its allure.
"Another helping, please!"

cards.name: The Overflow
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Candace, equip this card.
After Candace equips this card, she will immediately use Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide once.
When this card is equipped by Candace, her Prayer of the Crimson Crown has the following extra effect: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deals 1 Hydro DMG. (Once per Round)
(You must have Candace in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide
keywords.description: Deals 2 Hydro DMG and creates 1 Prayer of the Crimson Crown.

keywords.name: Prayer of the Crimson Crown
keywords.description:
Your characters' Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG.
Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' Physical DMG is converted to Hydro DMG.
After you switch characters, you deal 1 Hydro DMG. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Candace: The Overflow
splash.description:
Those who do not respect the regulations at cards...
Are the enemy of all who love the game.

cards.name: Right of Final Interpretation
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yanfei, equip this card.
After Yanfei equips this card, she will immediately use Seal of Approval once.
When Yanfei uses a Charged Attack with this card equipped: Deal +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP. If Scarlet Seal is triggered, then draw 1 card after the skill finishes calculating.
(You must have Yanfei in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Seal of Approval
keywords.description: Deals 1 Pyro DMG.

keywords.name: Scarlet Seal
keywords.description:
When the character uses a Charged Attack: Damage dealt +2.
Usage(s): 1. (Can stack up to 2 times)

splash.title: Yanfei: Right of Final Interpretation
splash.description: "When it comes to cards... Well, anything is permissible, so long as the rules don't forbid it."

cards.name: Poetics of Fuubutsu
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Kazuha, equip this card.
After Kazuha equips this card, he will immediately use Chihayaburu once.
After Kazuha triggers Swirl with this card equipped: For the next 2 instances, your Characters and Summons will deal +1 DMG for the Elemental Type Swirled. (Each Elemental Type is counted independently).
(You must have Kazuha in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Chihayaburu
keywords.description:
Deals 3 Anemo DMG, attaches Midare Ranzan to this character.
If this skill triggers Swirl, Midare Ranzan is converted to the Swirled Element.
After the Skill DMG is finalized: Your team switches to the next character.

keywords.name: Midare Ranzan
keywords.description:
When the attached character uses a Plunging Attack: Physical DMG dealt becomes Anemo DMG, and deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses a skill: This effect is removed.

splash.title: Kaedehara Kazuha: Poetics of Fuubutsu
splash.description:
There is something elegant about this match.
If nothing else, both sides may concede defeat without regrets.

cards.name: Fruit of Fulfillment
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When played: Draw 2 cards. (Once per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Moon's Fullness: Fruit of Fulfillment
splash.description: "Even the most bitter of stories contain courage and strength... The story of the good Golden Nara's adventures with us will help good Nara defend the forest."

cards.name: Master Zhang
cards.description: When playing a Weapon card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. On top of that, for each of your characters already equipped with a Weapon on the field, you spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round.)

splash.title: Arsenal Forge: Master Zhang
splash.description: Much burning frustration must transpire before a hunk of metal may become a keen blade.

cards.name: Ancient Courtyard
cards.description:
You must have a character who has already equipped a Weapon or Artifact: The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact card in this Round: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)

splash.title: Ancient Courtyard
splash.description: "Is mortal life not an empty shell, as unto a dream?"

cards.name: Covenant of Rock
cards.description:
Can only be played when you have 0 Elemental Dice left: Generate 2 different basic Elemental Dice.
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)

splash.title: Covenant of Rock
splash.description: "Rex Lapis bestowed him with a pair of eyes to see the world, and came to an agreement with him. The dragon then accompanied the Lord of Geo, fighting campaigns alongside him in the four corners of the world..."

cards.name: Rhythm of the Great Dream
cards.description: The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

splash.title: Rhythm of the Great Dream
splash.description:
"Enter our dreams, our world."
"Write of deeds good, brave, and honest."

cards.name: Descent of Divinity
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Albedo, equip this card.
After Albedo equips this card, immediately use Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma.
When there is an Albedo on the field who has this card equipped, if your side of the field has Solar Isotoma, then your characters' Plunging Attack deals +1 DMG.
(You must have Albedo in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
keywords.description: Summons Solar Isotoma.

keywords.name: Solar Isotoma
keywords.description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Geo DMG.
Usage(s): 3
When this Summon is on the field: Your character's Plunging Attack spends 1 less Unaligned Element. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Albedo: Descent of Divinity
splash.description: "The process of confirming the strategy for a duel also requires meticulous calculations..."

cards.name: Pulsating Witch
cards.description:
After you switch to Lisa, who has this card equipped: Attach Conductive to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)
(You must have Lisa in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Conductive
keywords.description:
This status starts with 2 stacks of Conductive. When attached repeatedly, Conductive stack +1. Conductive can be stacked to a maximum of 4 stacks.
End Phase: Accumulate 1 stack of Conductive.

When the character attached with Conductive takes DMG from Violet Arc: Remove this status and DMG +1 for each stack of Conductive.

splash.title: Lisa: Pulsating Witch
splash.description: As a Librarian who has read through tens of thousands of volumes, of course it's trivial for me to remember how to win...

cards.name: Rite of Resurrection
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Qiqi, equip this card.
After Qiqi equips this card, immediately use Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune once.
After your Qiqi, who has this card equipped, uses Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune, she revives all your fallen characters and heals them for 2 HP. (Can happen 2 times per match).
(You must have Qiqi in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
keywords.description: Deals 3 Cryo DMG, creates 1 Fortune-Preserving Talisman.

keywords.name: Fortune-Preserving Talisman
keywords.description:
After your character uses a Skill: If that character does not have full HP, heal that character for 2 HP.
Usage(s): 3

splash.title: Qiqi: Rite of Resurrection
splash.description: "I must... live on..."

cards.name: King's Squire
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When played: The character to which this is attached will spend 2 less Elemental Dice next time they use an Elemental Skill or equip a Talent card.
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Teachings of the Forest: King's Squire
splash.description:
A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bow.
"Remember, this whole world is but a dream of the forest... Please pass on the forest's language and the responsibility of protecting the King's land to future successors."

cards.name: Golden House
cards.description: When you play a Weapon card or an Artifact card with an original cost of at least 3: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Golden House
splash.description: All the contracts that circulate throughout the land are forged here.

cards.name: Setaria
cards.description: After you perform any action, if you have 0 cards in your hand: Draw 1 card.

splash.title: Crossing the Wall: Setaria
splash.description: A genius from the desert, deep within the rainforest's temple...

cards.name: Joyous Celebration
cards.description:
Your active character must be one of the following elemental types to play this card: Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Electro/Dendro.
The element corresponding to your active character's Elemental Type will be applied to all your characters affected by elements.
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)

splash.title: Joyous Celebration
splash.description: "Celebration should be shared with everyone."

cards.name: Where Is the Unseen Razor
cards.description:
Return a Weapon card equipped by your character to your Hand.
During this Round, the next time you play a Weapon card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.

splash.title: Where Is the Unseen Razor?
splash.description: The origins of this Branch Master of the Adventurers' Guild are shrouded in mystery, yet she keeps looking for clues about the sword, constantly challenging powerful enemies along the way...

cards.name: Beneficent
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yaoyao, equip this card.
After Yaoyao equips this card, immediately use Raphanus Sky Cluster once.
When Yuegui: Throwing Mode is created by your Yaoyao, who has this card equipped, and it has only 1 Usage(s) remaining, it deals +1 DMG and healing is increased by 1.
(You must have Yaoyao in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Raphanus Sky Cluster
keywords.description: Summons 1 Yuegui: Throwing Mode.

keywords.name: Yuegui: Throwing Mode
keywords.description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Dendro DMG, heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: Yaoyao: Beneficent
splash.description: "Pain, pain, go away!"

cards.name: Gales of Reverie
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Wanderer, equip this card.
After Wanderer equips this card, immediately use Hanega: Song of the Wind once.
When your Wanderer, who has this card equipped, is in Windfavored state and after using Charged Attack: you will spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character" and deal 1 Anemo DMG.
(You must have Wanderer in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Hanega: Song of the Wind
keywords.description: Deals 2 Anemo DMG. This character gains Windfavored.

keywords.name: Windfavored
keywords.description:
When the character to which this is attached performs a Normal Attack: DMG dealt +2. If the opponent has characters on standby, then this Skill will deal damage to the next opposing character on standby instead.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: Wanderer: Gales of Reverie
splash.description: "Squall and fury!"

cards.name: Stalwart and True
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Dehya, equip this card.
After Dehya equips this card, immediately use Molten Inferno once.
End Phase: If your Dehya, who has this card equipped, has no more than 6 HP, heal that character for 2 HP.
(You must have Dehya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Molten Inferno
keywords.description: Summon Fiery Sanctum Field. If Fiery Sanctum Field already exists, then first deal 1 Pyro DMG.

keywords.name: Fiery Sanctum Field
keywords.description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Pyro DMG.
Usage(s): 3
When this Summon is on the field and Dehya is on standby on your side, then when your active character takes damage: Decrease DMG taken by 1, and if Dehya has at least 7 HP, deal 1 Piercing DMG to her (once per round).

splash.title: Dehya: Stalwart and True
splash.description: "Don't hold back, let's go!"

cards.name: Moonpiercer
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When played: When played: The character to which this is attached will spend 2 less Elemental Dice the next time they use an Elemental Skill or equip a Talent card.
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Stillwood Moonshadow: Moonpiercer
splash.description: "Children fascinated by the moon will weep when they gaze upon it, for the moon has turned into fine sand and entered their eyes. In many stories, no tears are shed in vain."

cards.name: Crown of Watatsumi
cards.description:
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam (maximum of 2).
When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each Sea-Dyed Foam consumed.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

splash.title: Pearl Crown — Crown of Watatsumi
splash.description: "The people of the sea sing that these crowns of pearls and coral will never be stained by any dirt."

cards.name: Gandharva Ville
cards.description: Before you choose your action, when the number of Elemental Dice you have is 0: Create 1 Omni Element (once per Round).

splash.title: Gandharva Ville
splash.description: The place where travelers and Forest Rangers meet in joy — the village that listens to the heartbeat of the rainforest.

cards.name: Yayoi Nanatsuki
cards.description: When playing an Artifact card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. On top of that, for each of your characters already equipped with an Artifact on the field, you spend 1 less Elemental Die (once per Round).

splash.title: Art of Lacquerwater: Yayoi Nanatsuki
splash.description: "If my skill can reach that apex, I am sure that my lacquerware will bear out the pattern of the truth..."

cards.name: Fresh Wind of Freedom
cards.description:
In this Round, when an opposing character is defeated during your Action, you can continue to act again when that Action ends.
Usage(s): 1
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)

splash.title: Fresh Wind of Freedom
splash.description: "The heavenly bard brushed the strings of the lyre, summoning forth the gale, dispersing the ice and snow, cleaving the peaks, and making the new Mondstadt the home of freedom."

cards.name: Pankration!
cards.description: Can only be played when you have at least 8 Elemental Dice remaining, and your opponent has not yet ended their Round: After a player announces the end of their Round first, the other player, who has yet to announced the end of their Round, draws 2 cards.

splash.title: Pankration!
splash.description: "For victory, Credit Coupons, and the hottest goods in the Rag and Bone Shop... and the freedom that may come someday, strike!"

cards.name: All Things Are of the Earth
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Baizhu, equip this card.
After Baizhu equips this card, immediately use Holistic Revivification once.
When your Baizhu, who has this card equipped, is on the field, when Seamless Shield activates a healing effect, generate 1 Elemental Dice of the same type as your active character.
(You must have Baizhu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Holistic Revivification
keywords.description: Creates 1 Pulsing Clarity and Seamless Shield.

keywords.name: Pulsing Clarity
keywords.description:
When Action Phase begins: Create Seamless Shield.
Usage(s): 2

keywords.name: Seamless Shield
keywords.description:
Provides 1 Shield point, protecting your active character.
When this effect is removed, or generated again: Deal 1 Dendro DMG, and heal your active character for 1 HP.

splash.title: "All Things Are of the Earth" Baizhu
splash.description: "If you can perceive the heavens and the earth, defend against malignant auras with the flow of qi, and keep your mind clear, surely nothing can hinder you."

cards.name: Discretionary Supplement
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Dori, equip this card.
After Dori equips this card, immediately use Alcazarzaray's Exactitude once.
The Jinni summoned by your Dori who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of Energy gaine by characters with no Energy by 1 when Energy is gained.
(You must have Dori in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Alcazarzaray's Exactitude
keywords.description: Deals 1 Electro DMG, summons 1 Jinni.

keywords.name: Jinni
keywords.description:
End Phase: Heal your active character for 2 HP and that character gains 1 Energy.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: "Discretionary Supplement" Dori
splash.description: "First raise the price by 30%, then sell at a 20% discount!"

cards.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Nilou, equip this card.
After Nilou equips this card, immediately use Dance of Haftkarsvar once.
When your Nilou is on the field who has this card equipped, the damage dealt by your Bountiful Core is increased by 1.
(You must have Nilou in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Dance of Haftkarsvar
keywords.description: Deals 3 Hydro DMG, if the party includes Hydro Characters and Dendro Characters and characters from no other Elements, create 1 Golden Chalice's Bounty.

keywords.name: Golden Chalice's Bounty
keywords.description: After opponent's characters are affected by the Bloom reaction: Your team no longer generates Dendro Core, but instead summons Bountiful Core.

keywords.name: Bountiful Core
keywords.description:
End Phase: Deal 2 Dendro DMG.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack, max 3 stacks)
When you declare the end of your Round: If this summon has at least 2 Usages remaining, deal 2 Dendro DMG. (Consumes Usages)

splash.title: "The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain" Nilou
splash.description: Seven heavens, passing like a radiant stream, as though a dream drawn into being.

cards.name: Ocean-Hued Clam
cards.description:
When played: Heal the attached character for 2 HP.
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam (maximum of 2).
When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each Sea-Dyed Foam consumed.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Memories of the Deep: Ocean-Hued Clam
splash.description: "Bringing hopes and memories from the depths, permeating long-lost civilizations and history, these graceful and exquisite crowns slide into the forgotten rifts with their owners."

cards.name: Shadow of the Sand King
cards.description:
When played: Draw a card.
When the character to which this card is attached is your active character, then when an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction DMG: Draw a card. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Proxy Generations: Shadow of the Sand King
splash.description:
"Once, the wise mortal king and the clergy received divine oracles personally, and they were the masters of the land."
"Today, those who rule as proxies in the oases are the shadows of the gods."

cards.name: Stormterror's Lair
cards.description:
When played: Draw a random Talent card from your deck.
When you play a Talent card, or when your character uses a Skill with an original cost of at least 4 Elemental Dice: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 3

splash.title: Stormterror's Lair
splash.description: The ambitious dream was built proudly upon the capital of the God of Storms, and collapsed to ruin under the lofty song of freedom.

cards.name: In Every House a Stove
cards.description:
Draw a number of cards equal to the current Round number minus 1. (Up to 4 cards can be drawn in this way)
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)

splash.title: In Every House a Stove
splash.description: "The Stove God cared for the people, turning himself into minions who went into every home, fostering food and solidarity alike."

cards.name: Lyresong
cards.description:
Return an Artifact card equipped by your character to your Hand.
During this Round, the next time you play an Artifact card from your hand: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.

splash.title: Lyresong
splash.description: "The traditions of song and poetry, flowing onward in clear, moving melodies."

cards.name: Light's Remit
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Layla, equip this card.
After Layla equips this card, immediately use Nights of Formal Focus once.
When Layla is on othe field and has this card equipped, every time Shooting Star deals DMG, draw 1 card.
(You must have Layla in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Nights of Formal Focus
keywords.description: Creates 1 Curtain of Slumber Shield and Shooting Star.

keywords.name: Shooting Star
keywords.description:
After your character uses a Skill: Accumulate 1 Night Star. If you have at least 4 Night Stars, consume 4 Night Stars and deal 1 Cryo DMG. (The Skill that causes this Combat Status will also trigger this effect)
When causing this Combat Status again: Accumulate 2 Night Stars.

splash.title: Layla: Light's Remit
splash.description: "My guiding stars."

cards.name: Turn Control
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yelan, equip this card.
After Yelan equips this card, immediately use Lingering Lifeline once.
Roll Phase: If Yelan, who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Dice will be rolled as 1 Omni Element for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3).
(You must have Yelan in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Lingering Lifeline
keywords.description: Deals 3 Hydro DMG. This character gains 2 Breakthrough stacks.

keywords.name: Breakthrough
keywords.description:
This state starts with 1 Breakthrough stack. When re-attached, add 1 Breakthrough stack. Breakthrough can have a maximum of 3 stacks.
End Phase: Gain 1 Breakthrough stack.

When the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack: If Breakthrough has at least 2 stacks, consume 2 Breakthrough stacks to convert Physical DMG dealt into Hydro DMG and draw 1 card.

splash.title: Yelan: Turn Control
splash.description: "Things are about to get dicey."

cards.name: Conclusive Ovation
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Lyney, equip this card.
After Lyney equips this card, immediately use Prop Arrow once.
When Lyney is on the field and has this card equipped, the DMG dealt by Lyney and your Grin-Malkin Hat will deal +2 DMG to characters affected by Pyro.
(You must have Lyney in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Prop Arrow
keywords.description:
Deals 2 Pyro DMG, summons a Grin-Malkin Hat, and gains 1 stack of Prop Surplus.
If this character has at least 6 HP, then they deal 1 Piercing DMG to themself.

keywords.name: Grin-Malkin Hat
keywords.description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Pyro DMG
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)

keywords.name: Prop Surplus
keywords.description:
Prop Surplus can stack up to 3 times.
When this character uses Bewildering Lights: +1 DMG for each Prop Surplus stack. After the skill is finalized, consume all Prop Surplus, healing 1 HP for this character per stack.

splash.title: Lyney: Conclusive Ovation
splash.description: "A round of applause!"

cards.name: A Cold Blade Like a Shadow
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Lynette, equip this card.
After Lynette equips this card, immediately use Enigmatic Feint once.
After your Lynette, who has this card equipped, uses Enigmatic Feint for the second time this Round: deals +2 DMG and forces your opponent to switch to their previous character.
(You must have Lynette in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Enigmatic Feint
keywords.description: Deals 3 Anemo DMG. The first time this Skill is used this Round, heal the character for 2 HP if they have no more than 8 HP, but apply Overawing Assault to said character.

keywords.name: Overawing Assault
keywords.description:
End Phase: If this character's HP is at least 6, then they will take 2 Piercing DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 1

splash.title: Lynette: A Cold Blade Like a Shadow
splash.description: "Step on up!"

cards.name: Rushing Hound Swift as the Wind
cards.displayName: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Gorou, equip this card.
After Gorou equips this card, immediately use Inuzaka All-Round Defense once.
When your Gorou, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters deals Geo DMG: If General's War Banner is in play, draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
(You must have Gorou in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Inuzaka All-Round Defense
keywords.description: Deals 2 Geo DMG, creates 1 General's War Banner.

keywords.name: General's War Banner
keywords.description:
Your party's characters deal +1 Geo DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 2 (Can stack, can stack till 3 Rounds)

splash.title: Gorou: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
splash.description: "Rally!"

cards.name: Structuration
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Alhaitham, equip this card.
After Alhaitham equips this card, immediately use Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena once.
When your Alhaitham, who has this card equipped, uses Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena, if the character consumes a Chisel-Light Mirror with at least 1 Duration (Rounds), then always attached Chisel-Light Mirror with 3 Duration (Rounds) and draw 1 card.
(You must have Alhaitham in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena
keywords.description:
Deals 4 Dendro DMG, consumes Chisel-Light Mirror, with the DMG bonus based on Chisel-Light Mirror's Duration (Rounds) consumed.
If Chisel-Light Mirror Duration (Rounds) consumed is 0/1/2, then apply Chisel-Light Mirror with 3/2/1 Duration (Rounds) to this character.

keywords.name: Chisel-Light Mirror
keywords.description:
Physical DMG dealt by the character is converted to Dendro DMG.
After this character performs a Normal Attack: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. If it is a Charged Attack, this state's Duration (Rounds) +1.
Duration (Rounds): 2 (Can stack. Max 3 Rounds.)

splash.title: Alhaitham: Structuration
splash.description: "A process of elimination."

cards.name: Pain for Pain
cards.description:
Can only be played if your active character is La Signora: When entering play, generate 3 Elemental Dice of the same Type as La Signora.
When this character takes at least 3 DMG: Negates 1 DMG, then apply Sheer Cold or Blazing Heat to the opposing active character based on La Signora's state. (Once per Round)
(Your deck must contain La Signora to add this card to your deck)

keywords.name: Sheer Cold
keywords.description:
End Phase: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to attached character.
Usage(s): 1

When attached character has Blazing Heat attached, remove this effect.

keywords.name: Blazing Heat
keywords.description:
End Phase: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to attached character.
Usage(s): 1

When attached character has Sheer Cold attached, remove this effect.

splash.title: La Signora: Pain for Pain
splash.description: "You too will experience this suffering."

cards.name: Scorpocalypse
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Eremite Scorching Loremaster, equip this card.
After Eremite Scorching Loremaster equips this card, immediately use Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Pyro Scorpion once.
Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion created by Eremite Scorching Loremaster with this card equipped will deal +1 DMG in Rounds when Eremite Scorching Loremaster uses a Normal Attack or Elemental Skill.
Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion's DMG reduction effect can now be triggered twice per Round.
(You must have Eremite Scorching Loremaster in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Pyro Scorpion
keywords.description: Deals 2 Pyro DMG, summons 1 Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion.

keywords.name: Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion
keywords.description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Pyro DMG.
Usage(s): 2

When entering play, when the Action Phase starts: Attach Pyro Scorpion: Guardian Stance to your Eremite Scorching Loremaster. (When Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion is in play, the character will take -1 DMG, once per Round.)

splash.title: Eremite Scorching Loremaster: Scorpocalypse
splash.description: "For the Eternal Oasis!"

cards.name: Grieving Echo
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Thunder Manifestation, equip this card.
After Thunder Manifestation equips this card, immediately use Strifeful Lightning once.
When your Thunder Manifestation is on the field and has this card equipped, when an opponent with Lightning Rod attached takes DMG: You draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
(You must have Thunder Manifestation in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Strifeful Lightning
keywords.description: Deals 3 Electro DMG to the opposing character affected by Lightning Rod. (If there are no eligible opposing characters, deals DMG to the active character instead)

keywords.name: Lightning Rod
keywords.description:
When the attached character takes DMG from Thunder Manifestation or its summons: Remove this state, cause this DMG instance to increase by 1.
(Only one of this status can exist on the field at once. Some of Thunder Manifestation's skills will target the character to which this is attached.)

splash.title: Thunder Manifestation: Grieving Echo
splash.description: That which drives the Thunder Manifestation is a much more primal fury...

cards.name: Rending Vortex
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Dvalin, equip this card.
After Dvalin equips this card, immediately use Tempestuous Barrage once.
When your Dvalin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, when Total Collapse attached to opposing active character is removed: Apply Total Collapse to the next opposing standby character. (Once per Round)
(You must have Dvalin in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Tempestuous Barrage
keywords.description: Deals 2 Anemo DMG. The target character receives Total Collapse.

keywords.name: Total Collapse
keywords.description:
Physical DMG or Anemo DMG taken by the affected character increased by 2.
Usage(s): 1

splash.title: Dvalin: Rending Vortex
splash.description: But never forget that dust can be wiped away, and the power of doubt and poison can be shattered.

cards.name: Lunar Cycles Unending
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Azhdaha, play this card on them. Attach Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization to Azhdaha, then create 1 Elemental Die for each Elemental Type your characters have.
(Deck must contain Azhdaha to add this card to it)

keywords.name: Elemental Absorption
keywords.description:
Azhdaha can absorb the power of Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Electro. (Only 1 can be absorbed at any one time)
When Azhdaha has absorbed any of the above Elements: Based on the type of Element that was absorbed, gain the skills Frostspike Wave/Torrential Rebuke/Blazing Rebuke/Thunderstorm Wave.

keywords.name: Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization
keywords.description: After this character takes Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Electro DMG: If this character currently has not absorbed the power of this element, remove this effect, and then this character performs Elemental Absorption.

splash.title: Azhdaha: Lunar Cycles Unending
splash.description: "Today is the day... We settle this now!"

cards.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
cards.description:
For each point of "Bonus DMG" this card has, character deals +1 DMG.
End Phase: This card gains 1 point of "Bonus DMG." (Max 2 points)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Boundless Blessing: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
splash.description: "When flowers bloom, when leaves sway, that is me who sings the songs of freedom, of the winds."

cards.name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When the character uses a Charged Attack: Spend 1 less Unaligned Element. (Can be triggered up to twice per Round): Deal +1 DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Bygone Azure Teardrop: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
splash.description: "In the end, all people, good or evil, will find themselves ground beneath the wheels of fate, and the sapphire city would fade, dissipating like tears beneath the scorching sun."

cards.name: Beacon of the Reed Sea
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: +1 additional DMG dealt by character this Round the next time they deal DMG. (Once per Round)
After this character takes DMG: +1 additional DMG dealt by character this Round the next time they deal DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Desert Watch: Beacon of the Reed Sea
splash.description:
"On top of the ruins of the pool where the regalia of past executions of offenders was excavated, those who had lost the dream of the desert, yet were unwilling to give up their vast sea of sand gathered.
In the name of the Reed Sea that never existed, they connected with the dream that was promised to them..."

cards.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After this character uses a Skill: Until the end of this Round, +1 additional DMG provided by this card. (Up to +2 DMG total)
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Eagle Spear of Justice: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
splash.description: "The stone bird took to the unbound skies once forged. Into the heart of the ocean it dove, into the battlefield with the behemoth and the whale. Into the depths of the sea the behemoth sank, there to stay forever. Released from its thundering roars were the people of Liyue."

cards.name: Light of Foliar Incision
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses a Normal Attack: Create 1 random basic Elemental Die. (Can be triggered up to twice per Round)
(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Whitemoon Bristle: Light of Foliar Incision
splash.description:
"If you believe that he yet has the potential to reclaim his honor in the maze, then guide him to break off the pale branch...
Only then can the bright moon and the newborn stars grant him pure wisdom and help him shed his bitter memories and desires."

cards.name: Gilded Dreams
cards.description:
When played: Generate 1 Die of the same Element as the attached character. If you have 3 different Elemental Types in your party, generate 1 Omni Element in addition to this.
When the character to which this card is attached is your active character, then when an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction DMG: Draw 1 card. (Up to twice per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Golden Vision: Gilded Dreams
splash.description: "Some time later, absurd decisions would be issued alongside illusory madness, using lovely expectations as bait to lead the people towards a bitter end."

cards.name: Flowing Rings
cards.description:
After the character uses a Normal Attack: Draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Enthralling Tales Passed On: Flowing Rings
splash.description: "...And the stone that had been lost to the waters may have been a lesser jade, or perhaps just a simple cup. Some even say that the "jade" in the tale is in fact an analogy for a beautiful person."

cards.name: Echoes of an Offering
cards.description:
After this character uses Normal Attack: Draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
After this character uses a Skill: If you do not have more Elemental Dice than cards in your Hand, you will gain 1 Elemental Die of the attached character's Type. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Everlasting Uncut Jade: Echoes of an Offering
splash.description: "The wide river of a legend will oft produce many tributaries. One of these goes like this: This gem was once jade from a sacred mountain, carved into its current shape only by the hand of Rex Lapis himself."

cards.name: Heart of Khvarena's Brilliance
cards.description:
After this character takes DMG: If the character to which this is attached is the active character, then draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Cleansing of Filth: Heart of Khvarena's Brilliance
splash.description:
"If the darkness of death did not threaten it, no life would have any importance.
If the waves of forgetfulness did not surge against them, there would be no histories worth recording..."

cards.name: Vourukasha's Glow
cards.description:
After this character takes DMG: If the character to which this is attached is the active character, then draw 1 card. During this End Phase, heal the attached character for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Scions of the Khvarena: Vourukasha's Glow
splash.description:
"Many spirits dwell in the sea, and they carry the wishes of grass, tree, and dew, cleansing all filth.
Many spirits dwell in the sea, and they sing of the three mothers — of verdure, of sweet dew, and fresh flowers."

cards.name: Weeping Willow of the Lake
cards.description:
End Phase: If your Hand has no more than 2 cards, draw 2 cards.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: Weeping Willow of the Lake
splash.description: In ancient times, the weeping willow of the lake was an object of reverence. All the water veins converge upon Erinnyes and the weeping willow flourishes or withers when the waters are sweet or bitter.

cards.name: Opera Epiclese
cards.description:
Before you choose an action: If the original Elemental Dice cost of the cards equipped to your characters is not less than that of the opposing side, create 1 Elemental Die of your active character's element. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 3

splash.title: Opera Epiclese
splash.description: The true and the fantastical, the comedic and tragic find a stage here equally. Perhaps it truly is as an ancient Fontainian playwright once said — "All the world's a stage, and all of us merely players."

cards.name: Mamere
cards.description:
After you play a Food/Location/Companion/Item Action Card other than Mamere: Randomly create 1 Food/Location/Companion/Item Action Card other than Mamere, and add it to your hand. (Once per Round).
Usage(s): 3

splash.title: Mamere
splash.description:
A Melusine that paints every day.
"Because painting the things that I want to brings me happiness!"

cards.name: Seed Dispensary
cards.description:
When you play an Equipment or Support Card with an original cost of 1 Elemental Die: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: Seed Dispensary
splash.description: A special container obtained from Madame Ping. According to her, this dispensary has the power to "generate seeds"...

cards.name: Memento Lens
cards.description:
When you play a Weapon/Artifact/Location/Companion card: If you have played a card with the same name previously during this match, spend 2 less Elemental Dice to play it. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: Memento Lens
splash.description:
They say that in the distant past, the legendary Kitsune Saiguu left a catalyst for the then-Hiiragi Clan head, Hiroshi, as a tool to be used in exorcisms.
The Hiiragis would have a special Kamera made to order from overseas with that catalyst mounted on its lens assembly, before giving it back to the Grand Narukami Shrine as a symbol of their friendship.

cards.name: Passing of Judgment
cards.description:
3 Event Cards played by your opponent in this Round will take no effect.
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)

splash.title: Passing of Judgment
splash.description: "It is time to make the final decision on this case."

cards.name: The Boar Princess
cards.description:
Each time you discard an Equipment Card from one of your characters during this Round: Gain 1 Omni Element. (Max 2)
(This effect can be triggered by the loss of an Equipment Card from a character falling or from having their Weapon or Artifact replaced.)

splash.title: The Boar Princess
splash.description: In ancient legends, the Boar Kingdom was prosperous and filled with joy. The young princess of the Kingdom took the wise Fox and long-lived Tortoise, and set out on the road to the north, hoping to turn the little wolf back into that good child...

cards.name: Falls and Fortune
cards.description: Can only be played when you have at least 8 Elemental Dice remaining and your opponent has not ended their Round: In this Round, both sides must spend 1 extra Elemental Die when switching characters.

splash.title: Falls and Fortune
splash.description: The accident of falling into a pit can also be a chance to reveal the buried past beneath the dust.

cards.name: Flickering Four-Leaf Sigil
cards.description: Attach Four-Leaf Sigil to target character: At the End Phase of Every Round, you will switch to this character.

keywords.name: Four-Leaf Sigil
keywords.description: End Phase: Switch to the attached character.

splash.title: Flickering Four-Leaf Sigil
splash.description: A wondrous symbol shaped like a four-leaf clover, it is of great assistance to one who manipulates the elements.

cards.name: Fish and Chips
cards.description:
During this Round, all your characters will use 1 less Elemental Die when using their Skill next time.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Fish and Chips
splash.description: Fish fried until golden and crispy, with chips and a smorgasbord of sauces. Every single bite is suffused with savory satisfaction...

cards.name: A Subordinate's Skills
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Thoma, equip this card.
After Thoma equips this card, immediately use Crimson Ooyoroi once.
When your Thoma, who has this card equipped, creates a Scorching Ooyoroi, its starting Usage(s) +1.
(You must have Thoma in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Crimson Ooyoroi
keywords.description: Deals 2 Pyro DMG, creates 1 Blazing Barrier and Scorching Ooyoroi.

keywords.name: Blazing Barrier
keywords.description: Grants 1 Shield point to your active character. (Can stack. Max 3 points.)

keywords.name: Scorching Ooyoroi
keywords.description:
After your chracter uses a Normal Attack: Deal 1 Pyro DMG and create a Blazing Barrier.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: Thoma: A Subordinate's Skills
splash.description: "It looks like I'm responsible for another smile."

cards.name: Skiving New and Improved
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Sayu, equip this card.
After Sayu equips this card, immediately use Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash once.
When your Sayu, who has this card equipped is the active character, drarw 2 cards when you trigger a Swirl reaction. (Once per Round)
(You must have Sayu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

keywords.name: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash
keywords.description:
Deals 1 Anemo DMG, and this character begins to Prepare Skill: Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick.
If this usage of the skill triggers Swirl, then Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick is converted to DMG of the Swirled Element.

keywords.name: Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick
keywords.description:
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 Anemo DMG (or the Swirled Element's DMG)

splash.title: Sayu: Skiving: New and Improved
splash.description: "I should have just stayed in bed today."

cards.name: Sternfrost Prism
cards.description:
Can only be played if your active character is Cryo Hypostasis: Attach Cryocrystal Core to them.
After Cryo Hypostasis, who has this card equipped, triggers Cryocrystal Core: Attach Sheer Cold to the opposing active character.
(Your deck must contain Cryo Hypostasis to add this card to your deck)

keywords.name: Cryo Crystal Core
keywords.description: When the character to which this is attached would be defeated: Remove this effect, ensure the character will not be defeated, and heal them to 1 HP.

keywords.name: Sheer Cold
keywords.description:
End Phase: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to attached character.
Usage(s): 1

When attached character has Blazing Heat attached, remove this effect.

splash.title: Cryo Hypostasis: Sternfrost Prism
splash.description: Despite its highly stable form and almost machine-like movements, it must still meticulously defend its weak spot...

cards.name: Pearl Solidification
cards.description:
Can only be played if your active character is Millennial Pearl Seahorse: When entering play, Millennial Pearl Seahorse will have Fontemer Pearl with 1 Usage(s) attached to them. If they already have Fontemer Pearl attached, Usage(s) +1 instead.
When the Fontemer Pearl attached to Millennial Pearl Seahorse negates DMG from Summons, change to Usage(s) not being consumed twice per Round.
(Your deck must contain Millennial Pearl Seahorse to add this card to your deck)

keywords.name: Fontemer Pearl
keywords.description:
When the character to which this is attached takes DMG: Negate 1 DMG. Once per Round, Usage(s) will not be used when negating DMG from Summons.
Usage(s): 2
When you declare the end of your Round: If the character to which this is attached is the active character, draw 1 card.

splash.title: Millennial Pearl Seahorse: Pearl Solidification
splash.description: Xenomare Pearl, Fontemer Hoarthunder... The seahorse-shaped phantasmal beast, though a solitary king, has neither an opulent court nor the ruins of one. What it does have, however, is the majesty and might to send other Fontemer Aberrants skittering away from it in terror...

cards.name: Sapwood Blade
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When entering play: When the character to which this is attached next uses a Normal Attack during this Round: Create 2 Elemental Dice of this character's Elemental Type. (Once per Round)
(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Forest Sanctuary: Sapwood Blade
splash.description:
"...Even so, your stories and mine will leave their traces in the depths of the desert, like the footprints of the Forest Kind."
"So shall past friendships peacefully sleep, like an Aranara transformed into a seed."

cards.name: Veteran's Visage
cards.description:
After this character takes DMG or is healed: Based on the number of times this effect has been triggered this Round, the effects will be different.
First Trigger: Create 1 Elemental Die of the character's Elemental Type.
Second Trigger: Draw 1 card.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Face of Glory: Veteran's Visage
splash.description: "Yet even though the scars can be covered, the wounds laid on one's heart will not disappear."

cards.name: Jeht
cards.description:
This card will record the number of cards discarded from your Support Zone during this match as Sophistication points. (Max 6 points)
After your characters use an Elemental Burst: If this card has recorded at least 5 Sophistication points, discard this card and generate Omni Element equal to the number of Sophistication points minus 2.

splash.title: Drifting Sand, Drifting Dreams: Jeht
splash.description:
"Here's a thousand hugs! We will meet again!"
"May we meet again under a lovelier sun."

cards.name: Silver and Melus
cards.description:
This card will record the number of types of Elemental DMG opposing characters have taken during this match as points of Attendant's Attentiveness. (Max 4 points)
End Phase: If you have at least 3 Attendant's Attentiveness points, discard this card and draw cards equal to the amount of Attendant's Attentiveness points.

splash.title: The Best Attendants: Silver and Melus
splash.description: "Don't be afraid. We will protect you to the very end."

cards.name: Machine Assembly Line
cards.description:
Each time after your character is targeted by and takes DMG or is healed: Accumulate 1 point of Battle-Readiness (Max 2 points).
When you play a Weapon or Artifact with an original cost of fewer Dice than you have Battle-Readiness points: Clear all Battle-Readiness points and play that card for free.

splash.title: Machine Assembly Line
splash.description: Countless widgets, heated and forged, eventually go into making these exceptional machines, and to the inmates of the Fortress of Meropide, they mean valuable Credit Coupons...

cards.name: Sunyata Flower
cards.description:
Select a card from your Support Zone and discard it. After that, randomly generate 2 Support Cards in your hand.
During the Round, the next time you play a Support Card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

splash.title: Sunyata Flower
splash.description:
"This vibrant color is the miracle of life's flowing springs."
"Abide with me, sing and caper with me, and let us weave eternal joy"...

cards.name: Matsutake Meat Rolls
cards.description:
Heal the target character for 2 HP. For the next 3 Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again during the End Phase.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

splash.title: Matsutake Meat Rolls
splash.description: Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.
